channel.title: Guided Meditations Video Podcast
channel.description: Take time out to visualise and meditate with the Meditation Society of Australia. The guided meditations feature video footage from around the world designed to inspire and illumine. The Meditation Society of Australia has no religious, political or financial affiliations, it is a community organisation designed to help people meditate.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A series of short free video guided meditation exercises.
channel.itunes:author: Meditation Society of Australia
channel.itunes:summary: Take time out to visualise and meditate with the Meditation Society of Australia. The guided meditations feature video footage from around the world designed to inspire and illumine. The Meditation Society of Australia has no religious, political or financial affiliations, it is a community organisation designed to help people meditate.
channel.itunes:keywords: guided meditations, meditation, inner peace, meditate, learn to meditate, uplifting, stillness, peacefulness, spiritual, spirituality, yoga, concentration, contemplation, peace, inner

item.itunes:author: Meditation Society of Australia
item.title: The Ocean Breath
item.itunes:subtitle: A short video guided meditation with images from Hawaiian waves and beautiful ambient music by Makana.
item.description: For hundreds and thousands and even millions of years the ocean has done this. It has breathed against the shores of country after country. Shaping the crevices and caves and cliffs, smoothing the sands, exposing and carving the rocks for the myriads of life forms that evolved and found just the nutrients necessary for them to grow and thrive.

item.itunes:author: Meditation Society of Australia
item.title: The Aah Moment
item.itunes:subtitle: We are much larger than one tiny human being, it is our Aah moments that show us this..
item.description: We are much larger than one tiny human being, it is our Aah moments that show us this.

item.itunes:author: Meditation Society of Australia
item.title: Take this moment right here and now
item.itunes:subtitle: Am I living my highest and deepest vision of myself? Am I settling for what is easiest, what my parents or my friends want rather than living the highest dreams that I have for myself?
item.description: Am I living my highest and deepest vision of myself? Am I settling for what is easiest, what my parents or my friends want rather than living the highest dreams that I have for myself?.

item.itunes:author: Meditation Society of Australia
item.title: Love is the force that connects
item.itunes:subtitle: The ocean drops are connecting with you, the sky is connecting with you, the clouds are connecting and love is the force that connects so open your heart, open your heart with gratitude. Every event in your life is a gift, receive it with love and gratitude.
item.description: The ocean drops are connecting with you, the sky is connecting with you, the clouds are connecting with you and love is the force that connects so open your heart, open your heart with gratitude. Every event in your life is a gift, receive it with love and gratitude.
